ygData.subject: Re: Rumor of the bards ultimate weapon?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... That s what it sounded like.  I spent tonight hugging the zone in lower guk and netted a bubble of 30 exp, will probably check Kithicor tomorrow. I haven t
ygData.messageBody:
On Mon, 1 Nov 1999, Dark wrote:

> Bit confused but the high level undead spawn every night? Does that mean
> they are still dropping good items?

That's what it sounded like. I spent tonight hugging the zone in lower
guk and netted a bubble of 30 exp, will probably check Kithicor tomorrow.
I haven't heard anything about really neat items being dropped, I think
those were more from GM-controlled (and uncontrolled at some point) more
than the undead spawns themselves.

Athren Notechaser, thanking Quellious for giving us Angst
